summary: Completed testing of prompt orchestration stabilization features including alias detection, final report validation, RV terminology enforcement, and overall unit test suite execution

minor_issues.issue: Some unrelated retention tests failing due to Prisma client module resolution
minor_issues.impact: Does not affect prompt orchestration features

passed_tests: Alias detection for FINAL REPORT/REPORT/ВЫДАЙ РЕПОРТ/REPORTE FINAL (exact match only)
Authorization alias detection for AUTHORIZATION REQUEST/ЗАПРОС АВТОРИЗАЦИИ/SOLICITAR AUTORIZACIÓN
Case-insensitive and whitespace tolerant alias matching
Rejection of fuzzy matches like 'reporting voltage' and 'authorization process'
Final report validator requiring section headers in correct order
Final report validator requiring translation separator '--- TRANSLATION ---'
Detection of missing section headers in final reports
Detection of prohibited words (broken, failed, defective, etc.)
RV terminology enforcement in diagnostic prompts (converter/charger, inverter, battery type/bank)
Language policy enforcement (EN mode no translation, RU/ES modes with translation)
TypeScript compilation clean for prompt orchestration files

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All prompt orchestration unit tests passing
